text_block_list.text:
On a later day, El Condor Pasa came 
for training, as we'd arranged before.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
The unyielding horsegirl, conqueror of injuries, enters! 
Give cheer, El Condor Pasa is here!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oh, good morning, Trainer. You look very calm.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: So, so?! What kind of Ultimo Training are we doing today?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Thirty laps at full speed?! Uphill dashes until sunset?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Running around town with you on my back sounds great too!!
choice_data_list: You have some light running on dirt to do.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¡Aha, aha! Light running on ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
—— Mmmm?! Wait, I don't think I heard that right? 
What did you just say, Trainer?!
choice_data_list: You have some light running on dirt to do.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: It's the exact same wooords!! Are you a broken record!!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¿¡Por qué!? Why would you do that, Trainer!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
El will be known as the mightiest in the world one day! 
A condor who rules the skies where champions fly!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I can't afford to waste a single second 
on the ground, ¿¡entiendes?!
choice_data_list: Basic training is important, you know?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Mmmrm… mrmmm mmmmrm…!!!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
… I understand. I'll go run for now. But if you change 
your mind, please let me know right away!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Haa… can I really spread my wings through this boring training……

Despite her disapproval, El Condor Pasa did as 
she was told and began training on the dirt track.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Phooo. I went around lightly like you wanted, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¿Qué? Well, nothing strange… I don't have any pain at all.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: … Ahh, maybe—!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Maybe you were looking out for me and gave me 
dirt training because it'd be easier on my legs!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Wait, no, no, no, Trainer! There's no time to be worrying about 
that if I want to be the strongest horsegirl in the world!
choice_data_list: You can't be the strongest if you're injured.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Augh. That may be so, but… Buuut～……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ayyy, boo, El's got a case of the sads. I was so looking 
forward to the training you'd come up with.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Maybe you didn't believe in me from the start?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Maybe you thought some simple, basic training was 
just right for that big-mouthed El Condor Pasa?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: You never thought I could be the strongest in the world!?
choice_data_list: No, I'm serious about proving that, El!
No, I'm serious about proving that, El!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Mm…! That intense gaze…!! I knew it, you are full of passion…!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
B-Buuut! I still don't understand! 
Why go through this trainiiing?!
choice_data_list: It's to develop a world-class physique!
It's to develop a world-class physique!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: A world-class… physique……!?

I explained to El Condor Pasa that her body is still immature 
and developing. Putting too much stress on it now could lead 
to issues and injuries further down the road.

That's why I consider it important to properly adjust 
training to her growth, and with time, I would turn 
her body into that of a world champion.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: … I see. Hum, indeed, entiendo.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ah, uh, I heard a lot of technical stuff and El's head is 
kind of doing the spinny thing now… but anyway.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I understand how serious you are about this, Trainer!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: So… just to confirm. Please answer this one question!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Is it a bird? Is it a plane? No! It's the mightiest horsegirl 
in the world running over the turf!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: It's—?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¡¡Muy bueno!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I can believe in your strong, immediate answer!!
El Condor Pasa's words were accompanied by a contented smile.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hmm… then I need to do my entrance again.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Wait there a minute, pleeaaase!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: …… Allriiiight!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hoya!! Running through a raging storm with the speed 
of thunder! The one, the only — El Condor Pasa!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
And, from now on… the one under your care! 
Your partner — makes — her — appearaaaance!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: …… So, Trainer! I look forward to working together!

That was how I took my first step into the wide skies 
with El Condor Pasa by my side…!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Okay, let's get back to training then! 
Why don't you run with me, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
The strongest horsegirl in the world next to the strongest 
trainer in the world, and with the greatest physique! 
Wouldn't that be a great tag team?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¡…… Ayy, Trainer! Why are you running?! Why are you running?!! Don't make that face at meee!!
